about the project

An investment service targeted at those who arenâ€™t confident with investments. The goal is to sell our ability to produce reliable returns and manage investments with little hassle. The approach is simple and enticing to get them investors in touch and started.

Industry: Chemical raw materials

Tech Stack: Project management, Back-end development, Ux/ui Design, Front-end development, motion design

mobile version

Using a clean calculator widget we can give users a quick idea of what to expect from out service, all of it in seconds and covering a variety of options. This further incentivizes potential investors to read more into our benefits.

logo

A modern, clean and sharp approach shows exactly the attitude our platform promotes, To that end we designed a logo that's still expressive but tame and subdued.

Result
